title: Top 10 causes of infant mortality in Canada in 2018
summary: This bar chart has 12 columns on the x axis representing Cause, and Number of deaths in each Cause on the y axis.
Cause Congenital malformations deformations and chromosomal abnormalities has the highest Number of deaths and Sudden infant death syndrome has the lowest Number of deaths.
There is a difference of 402.0 between the maximum Cause Congenital malformations deformations and chromosomal abnormalities and minimum Cause Sudden infant death syndrome.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Cause in the x axis and Number of deaths in the y axis.
The maximum Number of deaths 412.0 is found at Cause Congenital malformations deformations and chromosomal abnormalities and the minimum is found at Sudden infant death syndrome where Cause is 10.0.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 12 columns on the x axis representing Cause, and Number of deaths in each Cause on the y axis.
Cause Congenital malformations deformations and chromosomal abnormalities has the highest Number of deaths and Sudden infant death syndrome has the lowest Number of deaths.
There is a difference of 402.0 between the maximum Cause Congenital malformations deformations and chromosomal abnormalities and minimum Cause Sudden infant death syndrome.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Cause in the x axis and Number of deaths in the y axis.
Cause Congenital malformations deformations and chromosomal abnormalities has the highest Number of deaths and Sudden infant death syndrome has the lowest Number of deaths.
The second highest Number of deaths is appeared to be the Cause Disorders related to short gestation and low birth weight not elsewhere classified.
Cause Congenital malformations deformations and chromosomal abnormalities has 41.2 times more Number of deaths than Cause Sudden infant death syndrome which is has the lowest.

Cause Congenital malformations deformations and chromosomal abnormalities is higher than any other Causes with value 412.0, followed by Disorders related to short gestation and low birth weight not elsewhere classified, and Newborn affected by maternal complications of pregnancy. Down to Cause Sudden infant death syndrome with the lowest value 10.0.
Similar Number of deaths is found in Cause Accidents (unintentional injuries), and Diseases of the circulatory system.
Considered together, the average Number of deaths in all 12 Causes is roughly 93.17.
The Number of deaths is 1118.0 if we add up values of all Causes.

data.Cause: Congenital malformations deformations and chromosomal abnormalities
Disorders related to short gestation and low birth weight not elsewhere classified
Newborn affected by maternal complications of pregnancy
Newborn affected by complications of placenta cord and membranes
